web_snippets: DANNY RICKER is an Emmy-nominated writer, producer, and author who currently serves as a Head Writer and Co-Executive Producer at “Jimmy Kimmel Live.
Danny Ricker. Writer: Jimmy Kimmel Live!. Danny Ricker is known for Jimmy Kimmel Live! (2003), The Mike & Ben Show (1999) and The Oscars (2018).
